```{r,echo=FALSE}
col<-(0:4)*.02
row<-0:29*.1
tabla<-matrix(nrow=length(row),ncol=length(col))
colnames(tabla)<-col
rownames(tabla)<-row

for(i in seq_along(col)){
  for(j in seq_along(row)){
    tabla[j,i]<-pnorm(col[i]+row[j])
    
  }
  
  
}

print(as.data.frame(tabla))

```
